New Records: CJ McCollum matched his career high with 50 points, and his 10 three-point baskets in 16 attempts may be the greatest shooting performance in Pelicans franchise history
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum's 50-point eruption led the Pelicans to a 132-120 win over the Wizards
Pre-Game Insights: CJ McCollum told coaches he would be at 40 percent from three-point range in 10 days, but he rapidly improved his rate to 37 percent after the game
Post-Match Reflections: CJ McCollum was grateful to see his hard work in practice lead to a memorable night, and he noted that his family provides clear motivation
Miscellaneous Highlights: CJ McCollum's shooting splits over the last four games are a scorching 57/51/83, and he is tied with Nikola Jokic and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander as the NBA's leading scorer over that span
Others: The game was played on January 4, 2025, and the Pelicans ended an 11-game losing streak with the win
